name: Platforming In Space
description:
Art and SFX from Kenney

WASD to move. If you turn off your magboots and move away from the platform you're on, you'll jump and wont stop until you hit something. When your magboots are on you can only move along the platform you're on.

Click to play music

There's no gravity, so you have to move around with magboots that you can turn off or on using the m key. 

Jumping off of blocks should push them away from you (There's a bug where this doesn't always work)

Enemies can be squished by blocks

Get to the fan to get to the next room.

It meets the GMTK theme because the blocks join together, and you join together with the blocks.
